tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarineSediments (
    ResearcherID INT,
    SedimentLocation VARCHAR(100),
    PollutantType VARCHAR(50),
    PollutantConcentration DECIMAL(10, 2),
    HabitatType VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE MarineSediments (
 sediment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 location_id INT NOT NULL,
 pollutant_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 pollutant_level DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES MarineHabitats(habitat_id)
 );

CREATE TABLE SedimentSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    habitat_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    pollutant_id INT,
    sediment_depth FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (habitat_id) REFERENCES MarineHabitats(habitat_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (pollutant_id) REFERENCES Pollutants(pollutant_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Researcher (researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE MarineHabitat (habitat_id INT PRIMARY KEY, habitat_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, habitat_description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE SedimentAnalysis (analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY, habitat_id INT REFERENCES MarineHabitat(habitat_id), analysis_date DATE, pollutant_type VARCHAR(50), pollutant_level FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE SedimentSample (sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY, habitat_id INT REFERENCES MarineHabitat(habitat_id), sample_date DATE, sample_depth FLOAT, pollutant_concentration FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE ResearcherData (researcher_id INT REFERENCES Researcher(researcher_id), sample_id INT REFERENCES SedimentSample(sample_id), analysis_id INT REFERENCES SedimentAnalysis(analysis_id), data_description TEXT);
